name: Contact Draw: Bowling
description: In Contact Draw: Bowling, you need to knock down skittles by using the handle that you can draw any elements, on your way there will be barriers such as: mesh, trampoline, conveyor and platform. They can both help and hinder you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.5+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Core HD Graphics or dedicated GPU with OpenGL 2.0 Support Storage: 100 MB available space
